pages.title: Dugong
pages.text: The dugong ($(o); Dugong dugon$()) is a marine mammal.$(br2)It is one of four living species of the order Sirenia, which also includes three species of manatees.

pages.title: Dugong
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:sea_grass$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 12 Days
